thread.section_title: Novadown Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Novadown | www.novadown.co.nz
thread.title: M Cassidy

author: M Cassidy
title: M Cassidy
text: I purchased a summer weight 95/5 Hungarian Goosedown Duvet. It's so light that it's hard to believe that it's as effective as it is. It's kept me warm on cool nights and yet I don't feel the need to kick it off it on warm nights. It balances my temperature which has improved my sleep. I'm an asthmatic therefore enjoy it's light weight and manageability. Highly recommend.
